needs: Wanjiru seeks to leverage their expertise in fundraising and portfolio support to raise significant commitments and improve portfolio operations efficiently. They focus on clarifying measurable outcomes and constraints early, optimizing processes to reduce waste and accelerate value delivery while maintaining clear governance and cross-functional alignment under complex and ambiguous conditions.
personality: Wanjiru is a direct and transparent communicator who values data-driven decision making and pragmatic experimentation. They prioritize simplicity, accountability, and clear documentation to maintain momentum and clarity. Collaborative yet focused on ownership, they embrace early risk identification, continuous iteration, and humane, readable processes to translate complexity into actionable outcomes.
